ね～っ、陰気なため息やめてよ～！\n士気に関わるんですけど～！？: Hey, stop that gloomy sigh! It's got something to do with morale!
本当に大丈夫なんですの？\nやはり今は、連携訓練に時間を割くべきではなくて？: Are you sure you're okay? Shouldn't you be focusing on your training?

%username, username, userna%, so you have an idea, don't you? Like, training against a

そりゃあ、やる気もなくなるだろ……あんなこと言われちゃあさ……: Well, of course I'd lose my motivation... After hearing that...
――時は少し遡り、霞光の起動直後の格納庫に戻る。: —Time goes back a little, back to the hangar right after the activation of the Kasumi Light.
実はその機体――霞光には、一切の武装がありません。: Actually, that machine—Kasumi Hikaru—has no weapons at all.
……ああ！ 機体だけ先に回してくれたのか。\n武装が届くのはいつになるんだ？:
...Ahh! So only the aircraft got here first. When will the
armaments arrive?

fire control device.
は……はぁっ！？ なんだそれは！\n丸腰で戦場に出ろっていうのか！？: Huh...huh?! What's that supposed to mean?! Are you telling me to go out onto the battlefield unarmed?!
いやいやいや！ 指揮官と言えども、\n自衛火器の装備は当然じゃないか！？:
No, no, no! Even a commander should be equipped with a

自分の身を守ることも出来ないってことだろ？: You can't even protect yourself, right?
目が泳いでいる。\nやはり丸腰での出撃はおかしいと彼女もわかっているようだ。:
Her eyes are darting around.
She seems to know that it's strange for her to be unarmed.
だが次の瞬間、生徒会長は意を決したように、\n俺の目をキッとにらみつけて──: But the next moment, the student council president made up her mind and glared into my eyes.
いいですか──あなたの役割は、兵士の目線で戦うことではありません。: Look, your role isn't to fight from a soldier's point of view.
あなたがその視野に捉えるべきは、個々の敵ではなく戦場全体！\n違いますか！？:
What you should be focusing on is not individual enemies, but the entire battlefield!
Am I wrong?!
ならば武装などなくて当然！\n指揮官たる者、突撃砲ではなく仲間を以て敵を叩く！:
In that case, it's only natural that they wouldn't be armed! As commanders of the
, we'll strike the enemy with our comrades, not assault cannons!
だ、だが、それじゃ俺は、命がけの仲間の背中で\n守られるだけじゃないか！: B-But if that's the case, I'll just be protected by the back of my life-or-death comrade!
それが嫌なら、『守られる必要のない指揮官』におなりなさい！\n兵士が命を賭ける前:
If you don't like that, then become a commander who doesn't need to be protected! Before the
soldiers risk their lives, become commanders who seize victory!!
なんの合理性もない言葉だったが……なぜか言い返せなかったな、\nアレは。: I didn't have any rational reason to say that... but for some reason, I couldn't say anything back.
ああ、すごかったな……俺も見習おう。: Yeah, that was amazing... I'll follow her example.
なんたって、彼女はザルトゥーム学園創立以来、\n最も長く政権を維持している生徒会: After all, she's the student council president who's been in power for the longest time since Zarthum Academy was founded.
１年生で生徒会選挙に立候補して、\n９８％もの得票率で当選したそうですわ。: He ran for the student council election in his first year, and won with a 98 percent br.
あの方の演説を聞いた人、みんな彼女に投票したんですって。\n対立候補の人も、らし: Everyone who heard that guy's speech voted for her. It seems like the opposing candidate, too.
……あの人、体から変な電波でも出てんのか？: ...Is he getting some weird radio waves from his body?

ともかく……武装を与えられないのは、\n俺が学園にとってまだ信用ならないという判: Anyway... I guess not being given an armament is a decision that the school still doesn't trust me.
自分で自分が何者かわからない以上、\n仕方のないことともいえるが……: Since I don't know who I am myself, I can say it can't be helped, but...

って、いつまでこの返事続けんの！？: Wait, how long are you going to keep replying like this?!
なんだか自然と板に付いちゃいましたね。: It's kind of natural that it ended up on the board.
